basics.name: Dennis Ezell
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Proactive software developer with experience in full stack development and maintenance of complex and business critical systems. Currently working within a Microsoft technology stack using an Aurelia front end with previous experience in a Java/Oracle stack.

highlights: Full-stack, self-directed Microsoft .NET development within an Agile Scrum team
Work with solution architects to provide overall technical direction for the project
Serve as subject matter expert when breaking down project epics into component stories
Design and implement new case management module leveraging an Aurelia based front end with an ASP.NET Web API backend
Create new Hangfire background job to perform nightly tasks for newly created case management module.
Utilize git based repository and automated build/deployment process to achieve continuous integration
Mentor new and less experienced developers
Full-stack, self-directed Microsoft .NET development within an Agile Scrum team
Member of project rollout team responsible for bringing new clients into the Jurisdiction Online application
Collaborate within the project team to perform code reviews and module design
Design and implement new exam management module within Jurisdiction Online

work.summary: Business Support Systems - Project initiative team
highlights: Leverage Java/Spring to produce REST based web services and front-end interfaces
Cross-functional Agile team member for new product initiative to consolidate legacy systems
Work with business partners to facilitate organizational transition from waterfall to Agile methodology
Full-stack Microsoft .NET development leveraging Agile Kanban for ticket prioritization
Resolve high priority issues preventing clients from utilizing system workflows
Work with support staff and clients to perform defect resolution and system enhancements
Perform peer code reviews for all code submissions

work.summary: Ensemble UI - Consumer ordering interface team
highlights: Java/Spring MVC based UI development within a quarterly based waterfall release schedule
Coordinate with back-end/middle-ware Ensemble developers to finalize system requirements produced by system analysts
Design, implement, and integrate medium complexity business requests within the Ensemble ordering platform
Perform unit/integration testing and defect resolution
